SEARCH
Package color

Class ColorScheme

java.lang.Object
color.ColorScheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
Color
public class ColorScheme extends Object implements Color
The ColorScheme class is responsible for showing the colors of a color scheme with one, two, three, or four colors based on a color scheme.

      colorIdx - the index of the color

    • getColors

      public String[] getColors(String scheme, int colorIndex)
      Obtains the colors for a given color scheme and color index.
      Parameters:
      scheme - the color scheme to use for obtaining the colors
      colorIndex - the first color in the scheme
      Returns:
      all colors in the scheme

      public void showColors(String scheme, int colorIdx)
      Shows the colors of a color scheme with one colorIdx.
      Specified by:
      showColors in interface Color
      Parameters:
      scheme - the color scheme that should be shown
      colorIdx - the index of the colorIdx in the colors ArrayList

    • showColors

      public void showColors(String scheme, int colorIdx, int i)
      Shows the colors of a color scheme with two colors.
      Specified by:
      showColors in interface Color
      Parameters:
      scheme - the color scheme that should be shown
      colorIdx - the index of the colorIdx in the colors ArrayList
      i - the number of steps to the second colorIdx in the color scheme from the first colorIdx

    • showColors

      public void showColors(String scheme, int colorIdx, int i, int j)
      Shows the colors of a color scheme with three colors.

      showColors in interface Color
      Parameters:
      scheme - the color scheme that should be shown
      colorIdx - the index of the colorIdx in the colors ArrayList

      j - the number of steps to the third colorIdx in the color scheme from the second colorIdx

    • showColors

      public void showColors(String scheme, int colorIdx, int i, int j, int k)
      Shows the colors of a color scheme with four colors.
      Specified by:
      showColors in interface Color
      Parameters:
      scheme - the color scheme that should be shown
      colorIdx - the index of the colorIdx in the colors ArrayList
      i - the number of steps tho the second colorIdx in the color scheme from the first colorIdx
      j - the number of steps to the third colorIdx in the color scheme from the second colorIdx
      k - the number of steps to the fourth colorIdx in the color scheme from the third colorIdx
